case.state: This is where the cards are happening, yeah? Name's Steve.
Always the goddamn babysitter...
Hey, where's all the chicks at?! Ugh... Let's just get this circle jerk over with.
That's Steve Harrington, by the way. That mean anything to you? ...Yeah, let's just get started.
Gives Steve the Dead by Daylight tag.
Gimme, uh... Shit, ~cards.text~?
Let's see... Yeah, I'll take ~cards.text~.
Let's take ~cards.text~. That's what Henderson would probably do.
~Cards.text~, and then I'll just hope for the best.
When I was growing up, we didn't have all these video games and shit. We had cards, so I'm pretty damn good at them.
It's not just luck, alright? There's a layer of strategy involved, and I happen to be a master.
I might not be the king of Hawkins anymore, but I don't gotta be to kick ass.
See? I know what I'm doing. ...Sometimes.
Hey, are we allowed to bluff? Jeez, uh, this hand really blows...
This'll shut up all those girls in science class who said I can't count to ten.
Heh. Let's see you say I don't win anything after this one, Henderson!
Ladies love guys who're good with kids, right? Well, I happen to be a pretty damn good babysitter.
It's all in the hair.
I knew this was my year. The Pacers started kicking ass, and so will I!
And the Harrington pride lives on another day.
I know she has a boyfriend right now and all... But playing a game like this with Nance, man...
Gotta have the right body to be a monster slayer. The chest hair makes 'em think you're tough. Like a bear.
I'm feelin' a comeback coming on. Always get a second wind during the fourth quarter.
I'm actually a certified lifeguard, so if anybody feels like taking a dip after this, you've got no worries.
Can't keep a good babysitter down.

Yeah, suck on this!
...The, uh, the cards, I mean.
This is what Hawkins delivers. Only the very best.
You ever hear about me working at Scoops Ahoy -- that never happened, alright?
This place connects to other dimensions, yeah? I better not see any freaky monsters running around.
I just had a great idea! ...Nope, I lost it.
I wouldn't mind playing for money too. Keeping your hair like this on minimum wage ain't easy.
Starting to think the sunglasses were a bad idea...
Yeah, alright... This one's on me.
Any of you into drinking? I was a party animal when I was younger, but I never liked hangovers. Usually stick to hanging out with Robin on the weekends now.
Do the people working this joint get paid at all? ...Think they're hiring?
Could really go for some ice cream right now. Wonder if they'll still take my employee discount at Scoops Ahoy...
This guy I know, Jonathan... Real strung out and anxious all the time. Guys like that always become stoners, right?
Why is my luck always so shit? C'mon, otherworldly forces! Throw me a bone for once!
Fuck me, man... Ah, shit, that came out wrong...
Y'know, I asked Robin if she wanted to come with. Figured we could appreciate the ladies together. She's never done good in front of crowds, though.
You might think things were easier for me when I was rich. ...Well, they were, but it helps not to think about it like that.
Had another one of those "getting chases by a guy with a bunch of bear traps" dreams last night. Least I wasn't naked.
This is what I get for never paying attention when they were talking about probabilities.
My friends keep making fun of me for the chest hair. I'm telling you, it works!
Too bad I lost my lucky underwear in the wash.

These kids have been running me ragged. Gotta get away from 'em sometimes.
...They're not my kids, just so you know.
Ah, whatever. It's all bullshit luck anyway...
...Shit.
Wait, that was a six? Damn it, thought it was a nine...
And here's the part where I regret not having some extra belts to take off, right?
Getting my ass kicked is just a regular Sunday at this point.
Chief Hopper kept Hawkins safe... and then he got captured by Russians. Real bummer.
Hawkins High has gone to shit ever since I left. Least I still got Sinclair holding down the basketball team for me.
I used to be a real, uh... "Casanova," Robin called me. Now I can't even get a second date. Shit sucks, man.
Eh, this is better than putting up with customers all day, at least...
Whose dick do I gotta suck to get a half-decent hand? ...Wait, uh, I didn't mean it like that...
Man, I hate being the stupidest guy in the room. ...Wish it didn't happen so often.
Anybody wanna swap? No? Even if I throw in a free VHS?
I've been having these... weird dreams lately. It's really dark, foggy... Usually getting chased by some guy with a mask. It feels way too real.
I'm not just interested in one night stands, alright? Finding the girl that's right for me has been pretty tough.
Hey, y'know what I got to say to the guy dealing these cards?
Chill out, Harrington. You're just naked in front of a bunch of strangers... Probably just a dream.
Be a real convenient time for my hidden psychic powers to kick in...
Eh, this ain't so bad. It's fun to show off the bod every now and then.
Yeah, that's a no. I definitely wouldn't be the same guy if I didn't have somebody like Nancy to kick my ass into shape.
Ahh, c'mon, you know you like it. Makes me look tough, right? Don't tell me you like softer guys.
Well, uh, I fell in love with a girl that turned out to be gay, so... does that count?
Don't say that, man. I don't wanna think about if I actually died all the times I went into that hellhole.
Look, man, I like food as much as the next guy, but... What you did? That's just weird.
Random question, but any of you guys decided on a favorite song? Y'know, just in case.
I mean... yeah, I'm from the 80s. I know time is kinda fucked here, but still.
Gotta be honest, Hawkins is going to hell right now. Still love the place, though. That's why I'm sticking around.
Trust me, you do not want me to be the guy enforcing the law. I barely even passed high school.
Yeah, yeah, rub it in. I still get plenty of chicks, y'know? It's just everything else in my life that's gone to shit.
Hey, I peaked in high school, but I still get plenty of ladies. Just... not any that I wanna put a ring on just yet.
You keep dudes as prisoners? That's messed up. How's a guy gonna get hairspray in prison?
Hey, whoa, did you just say you keep guys as prisoners? Can't exactly blame them for not having a lotta hairspray...
Well, depends on how your crew lost that money. I don't exactly got a tragic backstory.
Unless the people you roll with lost their money because of their douchebag dads, I don't think they'd have much pity for me.
Me? Honestly, I'm just some guy. Making 2 bucks an hour and keeping a bunch of kids from killing themselves, that's my deal.
You think so? I mean, most people would call me a douchebag. Maybe it's a little early to think I'm sweet...
I guess my reputation has spread pretty far. Hey, what guy doesn't enjoy a good time with some chicks, huh?
You think? Shit's always so crazy -- gotta have one guy bringing up the mood, y'know? Guess it's gotta be me.
Well, honestly, I use a lot of products. Can't imagine you're drowning in 'em where you are.
You think it's just an act? ...Well, you're not totally wrong, but I try to be tough.
Yeah, that whole jock life was never for me. Just a bunch of douchebags laughing about being jerks.
I know a little bit of French, I'll have you know. Ahem... Avez-vous un petit ami?
Ah, y'know, it's what I'm here for. Protecting the ladies is just what I do.
You must not've been around Hawkins lately. Me and Nance haven't been a thing for... a while. She's with Jonathan.
The sunglasses are a part of my look. I figured most ladies dig it. ...What, you don't?
...Nah, I don't need 'em. Can't hide behind 'em forever, am I right?
Yeah, I'm only a medium asshole. ...But thanks.
Yeah, thanks. I get that a lot.
Jesus, why does everybody wanna kick the shit out of me so bad?
Hey, man, I don't spill the beans so early. Let's just say that you gotta experiment. Learn what works for you.
My secret ain't gonna be your secret. You gotta dedicate some time to it. Try shit until something works.
It's kind of a blur, honestly... But bein' around you is making some stuff come back. Stuff I thought was just a dream.
Well, you gotta take care of it, of course. Leave it alone for too long and I'll look like Captain Caveman.
Alright, c'mon! What asshole is stacking the deck here?!
It's me? Alright, alright, don't cream your pants now...
Yeah, yeah, I got it. I just got shitty luck, alright? Well, it ain't all bad.
I'm up again? Yeah, alright, this ain't so bad. Better than being in Hawkins right now, at least.
See, now this is the fun part for you guys. Prepare to be wowed by the Harrington charm!
Well... shit.
It's a good thing I already lost all my dignity. I'd be real pissed otherwise.
Hey, you sayin' I'm some kind of trend chaser? Cause I am trend setter. Give it a few years, everybody's gonna be copying my style.
Uh... yeah, I can see what you mean. Bein' a cop and all. Must be in trials a lot...
Trust me, you do not want me being the guy teaching your kids. I barely passed high school. Couldn't even get into college.
My "aura?" Well, looking after these kids has aged me ten years. ...Seriously, though, I don't get it.
Observe all you want, for all I care.
Yeah, well, we're still friends. Just not... together. Plenty of fish in the sea, I say.
Thanks! ...I think. I'll take it as a compliment from someone cute like you.
You're lucky you didn't meet me in high school. I wasn't always like this. But thanks to girls like you, I'm learning how to be a good dude.
Ah, don't be like that. I remember you, and how much ass you kicked out there. I remember you're someone special, Cheryl. That's the important part to me.
Hey, I get plenty of chicks! Just, y'know, most of 'em don't stick around for long.
And what's wrong with a girl goin' all natural, huh? I don't mind. I mean, shit, not like I got room to complain.
If there's one thing I learned from movies, it's that chicks love a guy that wears sunglasses indoors.
...Honestly, I can't see shit with these things on anyway. Too damn dark.
Now I just gotta hope the sun doesn't get my in eyes. You hear me, sun? I got important things to look at here.
I love the place, but ever since those monsters started showing up, shit's just gone to Hell. All cause of that girl.
It's a good thing we ain't playing for cash right now. Think I've got more ex-girlfriends than I do cash in my pocket right now.
...You shoulda seen what I wore in high school. Nancy, my old girlfriend, she always hated that polo shirt...
Alright, just the pants, yeah? I've already come this far. No big deal in my book.
I like to think I've got a few charm points, but this one might be my biggest... and I mean that.
You shouldn't be seeing this, alright? If you are, submit a bug report.
So, uh, you guys enjoyin' the view? Cause I'm actually getting a little more into this than I thought.

Thanks, man. When shit hits the fan, we gotta be there for each other. That's how we survive.
...Wait, the hell am I talking about?
Ahh, it's nothing special. Sometimes a guy's just gotta step up, y'know? If nobody else'll keep people safe, I guess it's up to me.
Yeah? Well, I say I'm a pretty damn good babysitter. That's my way of showing I care.
A magician never reveals his secrets. But hey, come over to my place, and I can just show you.
You're pretty forward, aren't you? Heh, well, I do love a girl who knows what she wants. Hope you don't mind me joining you in the shower.
Just keep on lookin' cute over there and I'll relax in no time.
Yeah? Well, everybody's got their weak points... on the inside and out.
You like it? Heh, knew you would. Haven't met a girl that doesn't.
Sorry, man, it's just genetics. This is one good thing my douchebag dad ever gave me.
There's two definition of "lady killer" here, and I don't like either of 'em!
Listen, for me what matters most is whether or not we "click," y'know? I like a girl with some hair, but I just like girls in general, and I think you and I are clicking pretty well.
...Might be better to throw down cash than do this with a bunch of guys, though. No offense, but that's not really my speed...
Alright, dickheads, don't stare. I was just... thinking about that girl I was with last night, and it got me like this. That's all.
Those kids, man... Little shits always cause trouble. Especially the biggest shit of 'em all, Henderson. And I'm the lucky guy that gets to babysit 'em.
Now, clothes, I can do. I'm an eligible bachelor right now, so, uh... ladies?
I was skeptical at first, but you guys aren't so bad. Nice to hang with, even without all the, uh, porn stuff.
Either way, though, I'm way better without it. Nothing ladies love more than nuzzling up in the chest hair!
Yeah, yeah, I know it's obvious. Us guys can't help it, y'know?
Damn, I'm all fired up. Winning's nice and all, but I think losing would feel better right now.
I guess I've still got things to learn about myself. Like... well, maybe bein' with a guy is worth a shot.
I was hoping for lookers, but I didn't expect someone so cute to show up. Dig the braids.
You're pretty cute for a guy, aren't ya? N-Not like that's my thing, but...
Hey man, do I know you from somewhere? I feel like I've seen you out drinking with Chief Hopper or something.
...Hey dude, are you Russian? No problem with that, but... had some bad experiences with Russians.
I know a thing or two about monsters. Wonder how our experiences would stack up.
Hope life's been treating you a little better lately, man. I know both of us have been through some shit.
Here's one thing I could never wrap my head around, man. So we're buddies with Ash Williams, getting chased around by Michael Myers, right?
Dwight, right? I... definitely know you from somewhere. You go to Hawkins 'round the early 80s?
So which is your least favorite to face, anyway? Mine's gotta be that vomit chick. Always made me wish we could stop and take a shower...
I remember... those hooks, and all those big-ass dudes slashing at us... Shit, man, where did I even learn how to fix a generator?
Looks like I got competition.
Trying to upstage me, buddy? Well, we'll see about that.
Let's just... try not to make this weird, okay?
See? I can kick some ass too when I feel like it.
It's, uh, just like being in the locker room, right? Except everybody's staring at your dick.
Who's the man?
Hey, man, we can just hang. This doesn't have to be weird if we don't make it weird.
So, uh... This a typical ~weekday~ for you, or...?
Look, seeing other dudes, naked, no big deal. Place like this, though? ...Kind of a big deal.
Been looking forward to this. ...B-Because I wanted to win!
Alright, alright, nobody likes a showoff. Let's keep this quick.
Talk about a circle jerk...
I'll just, ah... try to keep my eyes closed...
Don't look, don't look... Ah, shit, I'm lookin'...!
Well, you've already seen my dick, so... Fair's fair.
...Ah, fuck, why am I getting into this...?
Look, it's not that I like guys. Who hasn't thought about suckin' dick every now and then?
Stay down, penis...!
Y'know, I've read some of Henderson's comics. Never thought I'd meet somebody who looks like they jumped out of 'em.
Not really my style, but a suit like that on a lady like you? I kinda dig it.
...Hey, uh, is anybody else getting bad vibes offa this chick? I mean, no offense, but...
Take it a lot of crazy shit happens in this "Silent Hill" place. Sounds a lot like Hawkins, honestly.
Man, I just... can't shake this feeling. I know the place you're talking about. With that elementary school, right...?
What's with that guy with the triangle hat, anyway? Never figured out what his deal is.

Hey, y'know what me and my grandpa that fought in the war have in common?
We won!
Just couldn't beat the Harrington special, huh? No, no, I get it.
Y'see, it's the little things that make it all worth it.
We should get to know each other, ~name~. Mind telling me a little about yourself?
Girls dress fine and all in the eighties, but it's always nice meeting someone with her own style.
Now this, this I like.
Fair's fair, alright? Don't go playing chicken now.
You ain't gonna think less of me if I said I was waiting for this, yeah?
What's better than watching a girl undress, huh? ...Other than doing it in private.
I'm no pervert, I'm just... picking up what I didn't learn in sex ed.
Aw yeah... Good job, guys...
Mind taking this nice and slow?
Hoping for something good... A guy can dream.
Ah, shit... Guess I shoulda lasted a little longer.
Aw, c'mon! You're picking now to get your ass kicked?
Well, I don't mind. Should serve as a good memory, at least.
Shit, how's my hair? Gotta look good for moments like this.
...Well, that was a good way to waste a minute.
I got plenty of nightmares, man, but I don't see what that has to do with you and me. ...'Sides, I'm not old enough to drink.
Well, it's just... Where I'm from, those guys are from movies. It's all fake. So how the Hell are they real...?
C'mon, dude, you're embarrassing yourself in front of the chicks...!
Don't underestimate how much the small stuff helps your look, man.
Nice ~clothing~. Really added a lot of, uh, style. ...Look, I know how to dress myself, but other guys are a mystery.
Worry a little less about your ~clothing~ and more about your hair. It does wonders.
Feels like we didn't all have to stand around and wait for this.
You're putting me to sleep over here, dude.
You're getting all the attention right now cause of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?
Ah, yeah... You always know how to treat me, Nance...
Eh. Not like I wanted to see better.
It's weird, though... I definitely know you from somewhere. Not from Hawkins, but... Oh well. I ain't gonna sweat it.
Wow, yeah, my dick's really twitchin' over here. Let's get a move on.
Hey, man, don't be shy. I mean, I know I'm hot shit and all, but it's no big deal.
Let's just keep it nice and friendly like this, yeah? Yeah.
So, uh... you guys don't actually think I'm that dumb, right? I mean, I'm playing into it, but...
Just a buncha guys standing around talking about fashion. Always wondered what sleepovers are like for girls.
It's fine. I was just gonna fantasize anyway...
...Can we get going now, please?
Almost put my dick to sleep while you're at it...
So you're a real hero, huh? Keepin' the streets safe by dark and all that?
Ahh, this is fine. We can work up to the bigger stuff.
Don't gotta be nervous around me. I'm the nicest guy coming out of Hawkins you'll ever meet.
Yeah, girls don't exactly drop their panties right away for me anymore.
Listen, I've learned to take what I can get at this point.
Hey, I'm sure you look great with or without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|it)~.
...Eh, oh well...
I'm mean, I'm not gonna bitch about it, but...
Mind giving me a little help over here...?
Well, I'm kind of a hero myself. I don't wear a get-up or anything, but any of those kids'll tell you I'm a real badass.
...Huh? Oh, no, I'm totally paying attention.
Don't really care about the ~clothing~. Just how you look with ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off.
So, uh... you make that yourself? Can never tell with girls...
See? The small things do matter.
Honestly, ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ brought the look together. I'm more worried about taking it apart.
Alright, let's pick up the pace...
I'd get it if you weren't interested in dudes, but...
A little more...
That's... not in Russia. Alright. Shoulda paid attention in Geography. What's it like there?
Me? Kids call 'em "Demogorgons." Some of 'em are like dogs -- others are bigger than you and me. Fought a few of 'em.
I mean, I thought those Demo-things were bad, but that Nemesis guy packs a fuckin' punch. Never wanna go up against him again...
I get that it's the point, but aren't you worried about ruining your look?
Fashion, man. Chicks love a guy that's dressed well.
I'll make a note on ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ for Henderson. Poor kid needs to learn how to dress well.
We're, uh... moving a little fast here, aren't we?
I'm just glad we're keeping it to this for now.
I-I mean, I wasn't hoping for anything more...
Yeah, alright, let's just keep it to this...
And just when I was thinking you're kinda cute... Huh? What'd I say?
...Wait, how the hell do you know about that? Nobody outside of Hawkins should... This is weird, man.
Huh? No, wait, I... Shit, I've definitely hauled ass away from him with you. And that... dude in the trenchcoat. Real bastards, both of 'em...
Now don't tell anybody I told you this, but... four puffs of Farrah Fawcett spray when your hair is damp. Trust me.
Well, I know who I wouldn't be looking at if I was jackin' off... N-Not that I'd be looking at you anyway...
Just make sure you don't get anything sticky on ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Now let's just keep this show movin' along.
Don't start feeling all cocky just cause you're not losing yet, dude.
Had me worried for a second there. Almost thought I'd say something weird...
Alright, back to the fun part...
Guess this really isn't doing anything for you. W-Well, what do I care?
Hey, be honest with me. Am I your type or what?
I like a girl who doesn't beat around the bush.
Now I'm just thinking about what you look like with even less.
Huh. Nance could rock that... B-But you rock it damn well too, ~name~.
No rush, no rush. Always nice to get a girl ready first.
Hey, I'll take it.
C'mon, just a little bit more...
You, uh... wanna give a guy some help...?
See, this is the kind of thing every guy dreams about.
Man, Robin doesn't know what she's missing.
So... a movie after this, maybe?
So there are beautiful girls outside of Hawkins after all, huh?
Teasing me with the anticipation? That means you like me, yeah?
Not bad. I'll take it...
Worth the wait? We'll see...
Yeah, just like that...
Well. That's, uh... Huh.
...Y'know, I don't hate this as much as I thought I would.
I'm not sure if I like that I've been looking forward to this.
Well, you're... not a bad looking dude...
Never felt like this in the locker room...
Maybe I'm just too horny right now...
Fuck, I can't stop...
Damn, that's... Why is that hot...
...Wonder if any guys had a crush on me in high school. Maybe I'd be a little more open to it now...
Not that this applies to me, but do you think girls like it when guys swing both ways?
This guy, Eddie, called me "big boy" once. Still don't know why I liked it so much...
Maybe picking up guys at my jobs woulda been easier...
This is all Robin's fault, man. She tells me she likes girls, and now I'm feeling all weird about guys...
Well, this ain't so bad...
I guess trying something new could be fun...
N-Never felt this way about any of those douchebags in high school...
...And of course, right after I say that...
See, now this is what every guy lives for.
Nothing better than peeling away a girl's clothes in the bedroom.
About time, right?
Finding a cute girl and getting her out of her clothes is what gets me out of bed in the morning.
All this for me? You shouldn't have, ~name~.
You know how to help a guy out...
Ah, fuck, I'm leaking...
And all that losing is now worth it...
...Well, this ain't so bad either.
If you need a testimonial, I've got at least one guy on record saying I'm "not a douche."
Hey, you know I'm actually a monster slayer? Just throwing that out there.
I don't win a lot, but when I do, I win big.
Does it mean anything to you if I say I'm great with kids?
I think we're gonna get along just fine.
Nice. Now that that's out of the way...
C'mon, just join me already...
About time we're done with all the stalling...
Well, we'll see how we stack up.
You keep yourself in shape, ~name~?
I'm not all about this, but chicks sure are.
You're gonna steal all the spotlight before I can even have it, man.
What do I care about some dude's chest, huh?
Yeah, yeah. It's all about the muscle.
Seen so many dudes with their shirts off... Man, sports are kinda gay, huh?
Guess I stuck it out to this point for a reason...
I'm... actually looking forward to this...
Well, I guess we're about to learn what I like...
Man, the atmosphere here is making me feel all weird...
I try to keep myself in decent shape. We should work out sometime.
I thought you'd be all flabby or something. Why are you here if you're a decent-looking dude?
Yeah, yeah, just you wait. I'll take all the attention back before you know it.
Next you'll pour a water bottle over your head or something. That's what all the douches in high school did.
Chest hair, man. You gotta have chest hair.
So long as girls like to cuddle up in it, you're doing something right.
Looking good, man, looking good!
I'm more about what a girl has up there, but... I can kinda see the appeal.
Wait... Why am I...?
Huh... Maybe dudes aren't so bad either...
...Weirdly smooth...
So, uh... Do you shave, or...?
Didn't think I'd be seeing so much penis today, but here we are.
Alright, man, whip it out. C'mon.
Reminds me of comparing dicks in the shower. Ah, high school.
Doesn't really bother me, just... not my thing.
Okay, so if I'm a little interested in guys, then...
I guess the build-up makes you a lot more excited, huh...
Well, don't keep us waiting... E-Everybody else, I mean.
Alright, man. Lay it on me. ...N-Not literally!
Hey, man... About time, if you ask me.
Fair's fair...
Well, I need something to look at...
You really know how to make a guy wonder...
...That's just sad, dude.
I won't give you a ton of shit, but... man.
You're just a grower, not a shower, am I right?
Don't sweat it. I don't care either way.
...Huh. Honestly, kinda cute.
I'm sure some girls are into that... and some guys.
Look, man, I know this is rich coming from me, but it's really about how you use it.
Well, at least we know who's the bottom here...
I'm still working out how I feel about this...
What's that guy say in the movie...? "Say hello to my little friend..."
Guess it depends on how you use it...
Think that's a good size for girls. Too much more and you might hurt 'em.
Trust me, I'm still a little ahead of you.
Hey, man. Nice cock.
Starting to think you wouldn't be such a bad wingman.
...Huh. That might be my preference...
I... guess it comes down to if you know how to handle it.
Shit, man, why are you here? You could pick up chicks easy with that.
You're not half bad like this. Now I gotta wonder if you're a grower.
Damn... Bigger than I thought...
You're... not such a bad-looking dude...
F-Fuck...
A little on the smaller side is nice too...
Jesus, man! You're gonna rip somebody in half!
Fuck! I thought mine was big!
Jesus, planning to whack some monsters to death with that?
Bigger isn't always better, man. Gotta know what to do with your hands too.
Have to wonder which of us is bigger...
That alone isn't enough to attract girls. Trust me.
...Have you ever tried to lick your own tip? It... doesn't feel that great.
...You wanna compare?
Here's a tip: tight jeans. Helps hide it.
Man, can't believe I didn't notice that...
Must not be fun having that in your ass...
This isn't what I meant when I called you a huge dick...
Damn, man... How does somebody even get their mouth around that...?
Now I know how my girlfriends feel...
I remember seeing my first pair of boobies. It was all downhill from there.
This is always my favorite part.
All guys like boobies. The guys that don't don't count.
The best part of a woman and a chicken.
Good things do come to those who wait!
I'm already showing off, so don't you think this is fair?
A guy's chest isn't much. A girl's is everything.
Way better than seeing it in movies.
Well, this is about to get a whole lot easier...
I can already tell a lot, but seeing it is the important part...
Fuck, I'm already excited...
No use comparing boobs. They're all great in their own right...
Big things come in small packages... Heh.
I'm always just happy to see a pair of titties.
Don't get down on yourself, ~name~. I'm sure as shit enjoying this.
Just as cute as the rest of you.
Small boobs, big nips, that's always a great combo.
Hey, if they're smaller, that just means they're more sensitive, right?
Any kind of guy that doesn't like boobs of all sizes ain't worth your time, alright?
If you don't appreciate 'em, maybe I could teach you to.
Wouldn't mind getting my mouth around 'em...
Always nice to play with...
